summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West Sixty-seventh Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all crosses, tees, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper fire protection and water service of said street, in accordance with Resolution No. 1048 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
